usage.title: How to Download Facebook Videos
steps: Find the Facebook video you want to download
Click on the video to open it
Copy the URL from your browser
Paste the URL in the field above
Click Download and choose your quality

faq.question: Can I download Facebook Watch videos?
faq.answer: Yes! Our downloader fully supports Facebook Watch content and professional videos.

faq.question: What about Facebook Live recordings?
faq.answer: You can download Facebook Live videos after the stream has ended and been saved to Facebook.

faq.question: Can I download private Facebook videos?
faq.answer: Private videos can only be downloaded if you have permission to view them and the content owner allows it.

faq.question: Does it work with Facebook Stories?
faq.answer: Yes, you can download Facebook Stories before they expire, similar to other story formats.

faq.question: Can I extract just the audio?
faq.answer: Yes, our downloader can extract audio from Facebook videos and save them as MP3 files.
